cab.content: JHIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OP HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT)S- E C R E TO.P*(49) 11216TH MAY, 1949COPY NO.31CABINETLOCAL government note by the Secretary of the CabinetIn pursuance of the Cabinet'a decision of 12th May(CM.(2+9) 34th Conclusions, Minute 6) the Prime Minister has appointed a Committee composed as follows: -Prime Minister (In the Chair)Lord PresidentLord ChancellorHome secretary minister of HealthMinister of EducationMinister of Town and CountryPlanningMinister of National InsuranceParliamentary Secretary,Ministry of pensions to consider the general principles which should govern anyreform of the functions and structure of local government inEngland and Wales.Mr. A* Johnston, Cabinet Office, will act as secretary of this Committee-(Signed) NORMAN brook cabinet Office-, S.W.I.,16th May, 1949.
